explanation: [0-0] Inside a gym, with a row of treadmills on the right, a young woman in a pink top and black tights is standing on a treadmill, looking down at it. Behind her, a woman in a white top and black tights is holding a green yoga mat. In the background, many people can be seen working out in the gym.
[0-2] The woman in the white top walks to the front of the treadmill and lays the yoga mat on it. A man in a yellow top is walking forward.

[2-4] Then, the woman in the white top climbs onto the treadmill and lies on her side, resting her head on her hand.
